employees.notes: Proff reports 175 employees for the company profile; the page shows this together with 2024 financial headline figures [1].

revenue.notes: Proff lists "Sum driftsinntekter 2024 1 368 581" and states amounts are in thousands NOK; value converted to NOK [1].

company.entity_resolution_notes: The legal entity is resolved as PEAB ANLEGG AS with org.nr 913 502 566 on Proff, and Peab’s Norway company page identifies Peab Anlegg AS as its nationwide civil engineering company [1][2].

srm_assessment.overall_summary: A project-specific inbound SRM signal was found: Peab Anlegg states a "high degree of reuse of excavated masses" in the Kongens gate project. Evidence is qualitative, project-level, and without quantified volumes, so overall tier is minor/pilot [3].

srm_inputs.label: Reused excavated masses
srm_inputs.used_for: In the Kongens gate, Trondheim road rehabilitation project, reused excavated masses are planned as part of construction execution [3].
srm_inputs.tier_reasoning: Evidence indicates planned reuse in one named project, but no company-wide or multi-project quantified input volumes were disclosed [3].
srm_inputs.volume_notes: No mass, volume, or energy quantity is reported for reused masses; only qualitative wording ("høy grad") is provided [3].
srm_inputs.uncertainties: The wording is forward-looking ("lagt opp til"), and it is unclear how much material was actually used versus planned [3].

gaps_and_uncertainties: No accessible source in this review provides company-level annual SRM input tonnage/share for PEAB ANLEGG AS [1][3].
Could not substantiate additional inbound SRM categories (e.g., recycled metals/plastics/energy SRM) with entity-specific quantified evidence [2][3].

evidence.claim: Legal company name is PEAB ANLEGG AS.

evidence.evidence_snippet: 42.990 Bygging av andre anlegg ikke nevnt annet sted

evidence.claim: Operating revenue figure for 2024 is reported as 1,368,581 (thousand NOK units on page).
Financial amounts are presented in NOK, in thousands.
Peab Anlegg AS is identified as Peab's civil engineering business in Norway.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Peab Anlegg er tildelt oppdraget med å bygge en moderne trafikkløsning
evidence.claim: The cited project is executed by Peab Anlegg.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Det er også lagt opp til høy grad av gjenbruk av gravemasser.
evidence.claim: Project states planned high reuse of excavated masses as material input.

sources.title: PEAB ANLEGG AS - Org.nr. 913 502 566 - Oslo - Se Regnskap, Roller og mer
